Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses temp. rerouted via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner, and Division due to, street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick. Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner, and Division due to, street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at UIC/Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at UIC/Halsted.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
